sent.orig: But when something is a very good deal we say it is a steal-STEAL.
sent.trans: 我们中国人会说，这些碟子简直便宜得像白捡的一样，所以就可以说是asteal吧。

sent.orig: Buy if you must steal, them steal away my sorrows.
sent.trans: 但你若一定要行窃，请窃走我的悲伤。

sent.orig: To steal ideas from one person is plagiarism, to steal ideas from many is research.
sent.trans: 偷一个人的思想是剽窃，偷众人的思想是研究。
